page.title: 13My area, near Kesgrave
page.content: I live in Penshurst Road, Ipswich. In my area there is a local shopping centre and an estate of about 2000 houses. There are about 100 trees in my road, 3 bus stops and mostly one car per house. There is a primary school nearby, (Broke Hall). Most houses have bay windows and porch doors. There are no houses with coal fires. They all have central heating and electric or gas fires because they are modern houses, less than 20 years old. The shops in my area are a newsagent, baker, dry cleaner, hairdresser, fish and chips, garden centre and a food supermarket. It is a nice place to live because the people are friendly and the facilities are good. The bus stops are close to the houses and provide regular transport into and out of Ipswich.
